Select 
	Name,
	CASE 
		WHEN Name = 'BIPL - ANDHRA PRADESH' THEN '10001'
		WHEN Name = 'BIPL - CHENNAI' THEN '10002' 
		WHEN Name = 'BIPL - CHHATTISGARH' THEN '10003'
		WHEN Name = 'BIPL - DELHI' THEN '10004'
		WHEN Name = 'BIPL - GOA' THEN '10005'
		WHEN Name = 'BIPL - GUJARAT' THEN '10006'
		WHEN Name = 'BIPL - HARYANA' THEN '10007'
		WHEN Name = 'BIPL - JAIPUR' THEN '10009'
		WHEN Name = 'BIPL - KAMSHET' THEN '10010'
		WHEN Name = 'BIPL - KARNATAKA' THEN '10011' 
		WHEN Name = 'BIPL - KERALA' THEN '10012' 
		WHEN Name = 'BIPL - MADHYAPRADESH' THEN '10013'
		WHEN Name = 'BIPL - MUMBAI' THEN '10014' 
		WHEN Name = 'BIPL - ODISHA' THEN '10015' 
		WHEN Name = 'BIPL - PUNE' THEN '10016'
		WHEN Name = 'BIPL - PUNJAB' THEN '10017'
		WHEN Name = 'BIPL - RUDRAPUR' THEN '10018' 
		WHEN Name = 'BIPL â€“ SAHIBABAD' THEN '10019'
		WHEN Name = 'BIPL - TELANGANA' THEN '10020'
		WHEN Name = 'BIPL - WESTBENGAL' THEN '10021'
	END as Site_Code		 
From 
	[dbo].[Company]
where Name not in ('BIPL-  DELHI(HO)', 'BIPL - HO', 'BIPL-  IND AS', 'BIPL - INVESTMENT', 'BIPL - SHAHIBABAD');

Select 
	Distinct
	TABLE_NAME
from 
INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS
where TABLE_NAME = 'Company'
